snippet.title: Rise of Agon - Our Story
snippet.description:
Our story of how Big Picture Games & Rise of Agon came to be. OFFICIAL WEBSITE: https://goo.gl/ZrIvQD

Big Picture Games is an independent game development company based in Canada that was created through our shared passion for sandbox games and the Darkfall franchise. At our core, we’re a group of passionate gamers committed to the unique vision that Darkfall brings to the MMORPG genre. Rise of Agon will always be developed by the community, for the community. 

Game Features: https://riseofagon.com/game/game-info/sandbox-mmo-core-features/?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=launch_promotion&utm_content=our_story_video

Compiled Patch Notes: https://riseofagon.com/game/development/compiled-patch-notes/?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=launch_promotion&utm_content=our_story_video

Music by Kai Engel: http://www.kai-engel.com/
Hopes and Dreams: https://goo.gl/vdqwHn
Better Way: https://goo.gl/nKzW1q
Chapter Three - Warm - 02 June: https://goo.gl/u1vnLq
Denouement: https://goo.gl/YFqCvR
Chapter Two - Mild - 04 River: https://goo.gl/shlWdL
